_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: LeafMC - Voltra Optimized
author: eggs@voltra.pro
description: Optimized by Voltra.pro for Minecraft server owners, delivering peak performance and frequent updates for the best gaming experience.

installation.script: #!/bin/ash; LATEST_RELEASE=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/Winds-Studio/Leaf/releases/latest); LATEST_TAG=$(echo "$LATEST_RELEASE" | jq -r '.tag_name'); VERSION=$(echo "$LATEST_TAG" | sed 's/^ver-//'); ASSET_URL=$(echo "$LATEST_RELEASE" | jq -r '.assets[0].browser_download_url'); RELEASE_BODY=$(echo "$LATEST_RELEASE" | jq -r '.body'); MD5_CHECKSUM=$(echo "$RELEASE_BODY" | grep -m1 "MD5" | awk '{print $3}'); SHA256_CHECKSUM=$(echo "$RELEASE_BODY" | grep -m1 "SHA256" | awk '{print $3}'); cd /mnt/server || exit; printf "Downloading Leaf version %s\n" "$VERSION"; [ -f "server.jar" ] && mv server.jar server.jar.old; curl -L -# -o server.jar "$ASSET_URL"; printf "Downloading optimized configuration files\n"; [ ! -d "config" ] && mkdir config; [ ! -f "server.properties" ] && curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizationsmain/configs/server.properties; [ ! -f "bukkit.yml" ] && curl -o bukkit.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizationsmain/configs/bukkit.yml; [ ! -f "spigot.yml" ] && curl -o spigot.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizationsmain/configs/spigot.yml; [ ! -f "config/paper-global.yml" ] && curl -o config/paper-global.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizationsmain/configs/paper-global.yml; [ ! -f "config/paper-world-defaults.yml" ] && curl -o config/paper-world-defaults.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizationsmain/configs/paper-world-defaults.yml; [ ! -f "pufferfish.yml" ] && curl -o pufferfish.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizations/configs/pufferfish.yml; [ ! -f "config/purpur.yml" ] && curl -o purpur.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/voltrapro/Software-Optimizationsmain/configs/purpur.yml;

variables.name: Server Jar
variables.description: The name given to the server jar file. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the paper release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.
